original_text: On the twenty-fourth day of the first month, as I was standing on the bank of the great river, the Tigris,
korean_text: 첫째 달 이십사일에 내가 힛데겔이라 하는 큰 강 가에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: On the twenty-fourth day of the first month,
as I was standing on the bank
of the great river, the Tigris,
